title: Caitlyn audio, Pool Party Graves visuals
body:
Two small pieces of feedback from 5.22:

* Caitlyn constantly saying "Boom. Headshot" is hugely obnoxious. More so than stuff like people spamming Lux laugh, IMO. I'd appreciate it being substantially toned down, or preferably removed altogether.
* Pool Party Graves Q is pretty much invisible on Howling Abyss due to the low contrast with the bridge itself. Can't attach a pic because I don't own the skin.

replies.body:
Hey viperesque, 

I can bring up the Caitlyn VO issue - I'm not sure if we'll be making changes there. However, you're right with Pool Party Graves  - it's pretty hard to see on Howling Abyss. We'll see what we can do to improve the visibility. :]

I think the Caitlyn VO is a nice touch but see a few people complaining about the frequency. I haven't seen her in game much yet, does she say it literally every headshot? Maybe she could only say it on a net/trap headshot and say every 3rd/4th AA headshot or something.

That could reduce the VO spam in laning and to be honest in teamfights with so much going on I probably don't notice half the VO with so many splosions and such.

Also while I'm here, kudos on the new Q animation for whoever did that. It's like you've taken the old '1 handed rifle' flair and turned it up to 11. Can't decide my favourite between that and MF's Q now! :3
